pageContext.claim: “I spoke to Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger yesterday about Fulton County and voter fraud in Georgia. He was unwilling, or unable, to answer questions such as the 'ballots under table' scam, ballot destruction, out of state 'voters, dead voters, and more. He has no clue!”
pageContext.analysis: This tweet, which mischaracterized a phone call with Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger, prompted his office to provide a complete recording of the hour-long conversation to Amy Gardner of The Washington Post.
